title: Embutidos Fanguito, Inc. Recalls Pork Products Due To Mislabeling, Misbranding, and Undeclared Allergens
summary: EDITORS NOTE: This release is being reissued as an expansion of the June 16, 2017 recall to include additional products. Details of this release were also updated to reflect a change in poundage. WASHINGTON, June 20, 2017 Embutidos Fanguito, Inc., a Miami, Fla. establishment, is...
impacted_products: 2-oz. sealed packages containing “Embutidos El Fanguito Chorizo” with a sell by date of Sept. 17, 2017.
